Author: LethalRevenge2020
Text: If I say “I think you look attractive” or “I think you look small” would either fuel their ED or make it worse    I genuinely do not think he’s overweight, he’s perfectly healthy (not a good ED word) and compared to the normal world - the same size as everyone else (also not a good ED word)   He started back up when he saw I weighed less than him which is kinda like :/ wow okay. Because during our relationship he was the thinner one - keep in mind I’m extremely overweight

Author: moon--princess
Text: Idk but if I was feeling fat (dysmorphia or no) and someone told me I was still "conventially attractive" I would absolutely take that as confirmation that I looked fat. But that might be just me and my brain. Could you try using other wording like "I think you look..." Etc.
